docs.text: 欢迎 ¶ 警告 请做好疫情防控，不允许将手机📱带进学校。 引用 各位家长，大家好！新的学期有些新的要求和大家沟通一下！1、众所周知，中考新政地出台和落实对学生意味着所有的科目都是主课，每一节课都要认真听讲，每一学科的作业也都应该认真完成。2、我们不要求家长辅导作业，只要求家长督促孩子认真完成每一科目的回家作业，对于那些经常不完成作业的学生，老师除了在群中告知名单以外基本无能为力，不是不想作为，而是在校期间根本没时间补，更不能因为要孩子补作业去停掉某一节课！最后希望新的学期我们每一个人都尽力，也希望孩子们在我们大家的努力下茁壮成长！ 主页 短语 Unit 1 Unit 2 Unit 3 Unit 4 Unit 5 Unit 6 Unit 7 Unit 8 Unit 9 Unit 10 Unit 11 笔记 Unit 1 Unit 2 Unit 3 Unit 4 Unit 5 Unit 6 Unit 7 Unit 8 Unit 9 Unit 10 Unit 11 Mon. Tue. Wed. Thur. Fri. 晨会 语文 数学 英语 数学 1 英语拓展 语文拓展 数学 数学 数学 2 科学 地理 英语 语文 书法 3 历史 历史 数学拓展 体育 地理 4 语文 数学 美术 英语 英语 英语 英语 英语 英语 英语 5 数学 体育 体育活动 科学 道德与法治 6 音乐 英语 语文 历史 班会 7 体育 周周练 语文 拓展 -- 8 英语 周周练 劳技 拓展 -- 数学 语文 数学 英语 --
docs.title: 欢迎

Tue. Wed. Thur. Fri. 晨会 语文 数学 英语 数学 1 英语拓展 语文拓展 数学 数学 数学 2 科学 地理 英语 语文 书法 3 历史 历史 数学拓展 体育 地理 4 语文 数学 美术 英语 英语 英语 英语 英语 英语 英语 5 数学 体育 体育活动 科学 道德与法治 6 音乐 英语 语文 历史 班会 7 体育 周周练 语文 拓展 -- 8 英语 周周练 劳技 拓展 -- 数学 语文 数学 英语 --

docs.text: 简介 ¶ 这里包括了所有已经发布的短语，可能不会是最新的，不过我会让他尽量保持最新的。
docs.title: 简介

docs.text: 这里包括了所有已经发布的短语，可能不会是最新的，不过我会让他尽量保持最新的。
docs.title: 简介

docs.text: Unit 1 ¶ 设计一个旅游指南 design a travel guide 旅游建议 tour suggestion 提出一些建议 make some suggestions 决定参加一个比赛 decide to take part in a competition 决定 n. decision 积极参加 take an active part in 设计旅游指南 design a travel guide 美丽的喷泉和鸽子 beautiful fountains and pigeons 在大百货公司买东西 buy things in large department stores 理由，原因 reason 人民广场 People’s Square 上海大剧院 Shanghai Grand Theatre 龙华寺 Longhua Temple 上海植物园 Shanghai Botanical Gardens 东方明珠电视塔 Oriental Pearl TV Tower 上海科技馆 Shanghai Science and Technology Museum 世纪公园 Century Park 上海野生动物园 Shanghai Wild Animal Park 东平国家森林公园 Dongping National Forest Park 在崇明岛 on Chongming Island 苏州河 Suzhou Creek 外滩 the Bund 原因，理由 reason 合情合理的adj. reasonable 进展 get on with 你的旅游指南进展如何？ How are you getting on with your travel guide? 吃不同的当地小吃 eat different local snacks 一个国际城市 an international city 以…出名 be famous for 以它的夜景出名 be famous for its night view 世界上最大的城市之一 one of the largest cities in the world 被誉为 be known as 上海被誉为购物的天堂 Shanghai is known as a shopping paradise. 在上海的东部 in the east of shanghai 去那儿观光 go there for sightseeing 因此 therefore 不足为奇 It’s not surprising… 大的购物中心 huge shopping centre 在上海的中心 in the centre of Shanghai 一个有着绿草树木的巨大露天场地a huge open area with green grass and trees 浦东新区 Pudong New District 桥梁和隧道 bridges and tunnels 浦东和浦西之间的往返很方便 It’s convenient to travel between Pudong and Puxi. 不方便的 adj. inconvenient 方便 n. convenience 磁悬浮在大约8分钟内送你到国际机场 The maglev takes you to the international airport in about eight minutes. 城市西南部30公里处 30km south-west of the city 佘山国家旅游度假区 Sheshan State Resort 一个著名的教堂和一个天文台 a famous church and an observatory 一个目录页 a contents page 黄浦江 the Huangpu River 去浦江游览 go on Huangpu river cruises 一个受欢迎的地方 a popular place 名胜 interesting places=places of interest 写了两页 write two pages 想起；想到 think of
docs.title: Unit 1

docs.title: Unit 1

docs.text: Unit 2 ¶ 选择一部电影 choose a film 选择 n. choice 看阅读指南 read a film guide 讨论看哪部电影 discuss which film to see 讨论 n. discussion 看一看 take a look at…=have a look at 一部关于马戏团里愚蠢小丑的电影 a film about stupid clowns in the circus 滑稽的电影 funny films 《警察故事》怎么样？ What about ‘Police Story’? 讨厌动作片 hate action films 关于警察和盗贼 about policemen and robbers 抢v. rob 抢劫案n. robbery 喜欢冒险片 like films about adventures 太空大战 space war 一些宇航员在太空的冒险 the adventures of some astronauts in space 一个关于天鹅公主和王子的爱情故事 a love story about a swan princess and a prince 持续时间 duration 一年中最棒的卡通片 the greatest cartoon of the year 充满了笑声和欢乐 be full of laughter and fun 有很多打斗的电影 a film with a lot of action 一年中最激动人心的电影 the most exciting film of the year 美猴王 Monkey King 错过这部卡通片 miss this cartoon 一部关于偏远小镇牛仔的电影 a film about cowboys in a small town far away 孩子们的日记 Children’s diary 上小提琴课 take violin lessons 买票 pay for the ticket 总共 altogether 我怎么到……? How can I get to / How to get to…? 沿着海洋大道 walk along Sea Avenue 左转进入伍德巷 turn left into Wood Lane 发现城市电影院在你右边 find City Cinema on your right 在地图上画出最短路线 draw the shortest route on the map 我不知道城市电影院在哪。 I don’t know where City Cinema is.
docs.title: Unit 2

How can I get to / How to get to…? 沿着海洋大道 walk along Sea Avenue 左转进入伍德巷 turn left into Wood Lane 发现城市电影院在你右边 find City Cinema on your right 在地图上画出最短路线 draw the shortest route on the map 我不知道城市电影院在哪。 I don’t know where City Cinema is.
docs.title: Unit 2

docs.text: Unit 3 ¶ 李家 the Li family = the Lis 她的职业是什么? What’s her job? / What’s she? / What job does she do? 在一个学校教数学 teach maths in a school 她当建筑师多久了？ How long has she been an architect? 他当工程师好几年了。 He has been an engineer for quite a few years. 有几年了 for several years 她做秘书已经12年了。 She has been a secretary for 12 years. 自从12年前他就当警察了。 He has been a policeman since 12 years ago. 他在公司工作并设计机器。 He works in a company and designs machines. 他抓贼并为城市的安全而出力。 He caches thieves and helps keep the city safe. 建筑师画大楼平面图。 An architect draws plans of buildings. 邮递员送信。 A postman delivers letters. 教练在运动方面训练人。 A coach trains someone in sport. 校长负责主管一个学校。 A headmaster is in charge of a school. 秘书打字接电话。 A secretary types letters and answers the phone. 服务员把菜带来给客人。 A waiter brings food to customers. 男服务员 waiter 女服务员 waitress 厨师为人们做菜。 A cook cooks food for people. 农民种菜。 A farmer grows vegetables. 钟表被用来报时。 A watch is used to tell the time. = A watch is used for telling the time. 钥匙圈被用来拴住钥匙。 A key ring is used to hold the keys. = A key ring is used for holding the keys. 完成他的邮件 complete her e-mail 坐缆车到山顶 take the cable car to the top of a hill 缆车被用来带人们上山。 A cable car is used for carrying people up a hill. 山顶风景很好。 The view from the top of the hill is fantastic. 给某人买… buy sth. for sb. 被用来去做某事 be used for doing = be used to do 习惯于做某事 be used to doing / get used to doing 过去常常做某事 used to do sth. 相当多 quite a few / quite a little 只有一点点 only a few / only a little
docs.title: Unit 3

docs.text: 李家 the Li family = the Lis 她的职业是什么? What’s her job? / What’s she? / What job does she do? 在一个学校教数学 teach maths in a school 她当建筑师多久了？ How long has she been an architect? 他当工程师好几年了。 He has been an engineer for quite a few years. 有几年了 for several years 她做秘书已经12年了。 She has been a secretary for 12 years. 自从12年前他就当警察了。 He has been a policeman since 12 years ago. 他在公司工作并设计机器。 He works in a company and designs machines. 他抓贼并为城市的安全而出力。 He caches thieves and helps keep the city safe. 建筑师画大楼平面图。 An architect draws plans of buildings. 邮递员送信。 A postman delivers letters. 教练在运动方面训练人。 A coach trains someone in sport. 校长负责主管一个学校。 A headmaster is in charge of a school. 秘书打字接电话。 A secretary types letters and answers the phone. 服务员把菜带来给客人。 A waiter brings food to customers. 男服务员 waiter 女服务员 waitress 厨师为人们做菜。 A cook cooks food for people. 农民种菜。 A farmer grows vegetables. 钟表被用来报时。 A watch is used to tell the time. = A watch is used for telling the time. 钥匙圈被用来拴住钥匙。 A key ring is used to hold the keys. = A key ring is used for holding the keys. 完成他的邮件 complete her e-mail 坐缆车到山顶 take the cable car to the top of a hill 缆车被用来带人们上山。 A cable car is used for carrying people up a hill. 山顶风景很好。 The view from the top of the hill is fantastic. 给某人买… buy sth. for sb. 被用来去做某事 be used for doing = be used to do 习惯于做某事 be used to doing / get used to doing 过去常常做某事 used to do sth. 相当多 quite a few / quite a little 只有一点点 only a few / only a little

docs.text: 简介 ¶ 警告 格式崩坏警告
docs.title: 简介

docs.text: 警告 格式崩坏警告
docs.title: 简介

docs.text: Unit1 ¶ I have been to Beijing. 我曾去过北京 ( 现在已不在北京） I have been in Beijing for 5 years. 我在北京已经5年了( 现在还在北京） He has gone to Beijing. 他去北京了 (北京之行还没有结束，还没有回来） decide to do sth. 决定做某事 decide not to do sth.决定不做某事 I decide not to leave Shanghai. make a decision 做出一个决定 take part in 参加（活动）= join in We all took part in the discussion. Who will take part in tomorrow’s competition? join 加入（团体，组织） He joined the army ten years ago. Let’s join them. competition [,kɔmpi’tiʃən] 竞争； 比赛 n. The children had a competition to see who could hop the fastest. If you don't believe me, let's have a competition and see. compete [kəm’pi:t] 竞争 v. It is difficult for a small grocery store to compete with a supermarket. tour [tuə] n. 旅行，旅游 My tour lasted two months. v.旅游，旅行，参观 We toured the streets of Hong Kong. tourist n. 游客 design [di’zain] v. / n.设计 Architects design buildings. They have a design for a rich, full life. designer n.设计师 suggest v. 建议 (1) suggest ( that ) sb. should… I suggest ( that ) we should talk in English from now on. (2) suggest doing sth. I suggest trying once more. suggestion n. make/give some suggestions 给出一些建议 creek [kri:k] n. 小溪 Suzhou Creek 苏州河 grand [ɡrænd] adj. 大，壮丽的，宏伟的 the Grand Canyon 大峡谷 Shanghai Grand Theatre上海大剧院 oriental v. [,ɔ:ri’entəl] 东方的 oriental countries/art orient n. 东方 11 sightseeing n.观光 Some people like to lie on the beach, but I prefer sightseeing. go sightseeing 去观光 12 get on wit h 进展 How are you getting on with your project? get on (well) with 与...相处（融洽） I get on well with my classmates. be famous for 以...而出名（以某种知识、技能、作品或特征而出名） He is famous for his great inventions. Hangzhou is famous for the West Lake. be famous as作为…而出名（以某种身份而出名） He is famous as a great inventor. view n. 景色，风景 The house has a view over the sea. 意见，观点 In my view, she has done nothing wrong. be known as 被看作，被称为 Hong Kong is known as the Pearl of the Orient. paradise [ˈpærədais] n. 天堂 The club is a sportsman’s paradise. therefore adv. 因此，所以 I was ill, and therefore could not come. He has broken his leg and therefore he can’t walk. surprising adj. 令人吃惊的 It is surprising that he made friends with the stranger immediately. It’s not surprising…不足为奇 It’s not surprising that many tourists come to visit Shanghai. surprised adj. 感到惊讶的 He was surprised that his father had sold the farm. surprise v. 使吃惊 The news surprised us all. surprise n. 吃惊 to one’s surprise使某人吃惊的是… To my surprise, we won the game. if 如果 ( 引导条件状语从句） I won’t go there with you if it rains tomorrow. 主将从现 Have a good rest if you are tired. 主祈从现 You must see the doctor if you are ill. 主情从现 go for 去找 Where can I go for help? cruise [kru:z] n. 乘船游览 a cruise ship 载客长途航行的游船 22 floating [ˈfləʊtɪŋ] adj. 不固定的，浮动的 Now nearly every big city in the world has a large floating population. float v. 漂浮 The empty boat was floating on the sea. think of 想起,想到 I couldn’t think of the name of that man anyhow. Spring makes me think of flowers. 考虑 They are thinking of (about) buying a new car.
docs.title: Unit1

Spring makes me think of flowers. 考虑 They are thinking of (about) buying a new car.
docs.title: Unit1

docs.text: Unit2 ¶ choose v. 选择 choice n. take a look 看一看: have a look Let’s take a look at the map. stupid adj. [ˈstju:pid]愚蠢的: silly ; foolish action n. 动作 action film 动作片，武打片 Actions are more important than words. act v. 行动, 扮演 actor n. 男演员 actress n. 女演员 active adj. 积极的 robber [ˈrɔbə] n. 强盗 They kept a close eye on the robber. rob v. 抢劫 rob sb. of sth. They robbed the bank of a lot of money. steal sth. from sb. They stole a lot of money from the bank. robbery n. 抢劫案 hate v. 讨厌，不喜欢：dislike hate to do sth. / hate doing sth. I hate to interrupt someone who is busy working. I hate going to work. adventure [ədˈventʃə] n . 冒险 Adventure is the salt of life to some people. Boys are usually fond of adventure. in space 在太空 There are many different kinds of stars in space. in the sky在空中 A plane is flying high in the sky. duration n. [djuəˈreiʃən]持续时间 We hope the war will be of short duration. full of 充满，挤满 The hall is full of people. = The hall is crowded with people. The bottle is full of water. = The bottle is filled with water laughter [ˈlɑ:ftə] n. 笑，笑声 I can hear his laughter even in the next room. laugh v.大笑 laugh at 嘲笑 miss v. 错过 Hurry up, or you will miss the early bus. 思念 I miss you very much. missing adj. 丢失的，失踪的 They still hoped to find their missing son. diary [ˈdaiəri] n. 日记 dairy [ˈdɛəri] n. 牛奶场，乳品店 pay v. 支付 He paid the taxi and hurried home. They had to pay 200 yuan before leaving the place. pay for 支付…的费用 How much did you pay for your car? You’ll have to pay 70 yuan a week for your meals. Sb. spends some money on sth. Sth. costs sb. some money Sb. pays some money for sth. altogether adv. 总共：in all Altogether there were 18 people on the bus. price n. 价格 What is the price of the suit? = How much is the suit? = How much does the suit cost? the price is high / low route [ru:t] n. 路线 Which is the shortest / longest route to the supermarket? 18．问路： Where is the post office? How can I get to the post office? Please tell me how to get to the post office. Could / Can you tell me the way to the post office? 指路： Turn left. Walk along Rose Street. Turn right into Rose Street and walk along. Walk straight ahead. Take the first turning on the right. Take the second turning on the left. Walk to the end of the road. Walk down the street（南） Walk up Green Road.（北） You’ll see the post office in front of you. You’ll see the cinema on your right.
